info.name: Movie API
info.description:
# Introduction
This API can be used to retrieve and modify data in a database containing information about movies shown in cinemas.

# Authentication
No authentication is needed to use this API.

# Rate limit
There is no limit to the number of requests that could be made to this API.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "The King's Man",
    "release": "2020-09-18",
    "length": "98",
    "description": "As a collection of history's worst tyrants and criminal masterminds gather to plot a war to wipe out millions, one man must race against time to stop them.",
    "mpaa_rating": "PG-13",
    "genre": ["comedy","adventure","action"],
    "director": "Matthew Vaughn",
    "performer": ["Ralph Fiennes","Matthew Goode","Gemma Arterton"],
    "language": "English"
}

request.description: This endpoint can be used by movie studios and independent film creators to add their movies to the database. The entries that are created will be made visible to the users to access information regarding movies they can watch. The body should contain the fields listed below and some of the parameters can be multiple values (a list) and these special (multi) parameters are genre, director, performer, and language.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "The King's Man",

    "title": "Morbius",
    "release": "2022-04-01",
    "length": "104",
    "description": "Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others suffering his same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble.",
    "mpaa_rating": "PG-13",
    "genre": ["superhero","adventure","action","horror","science fiction","Drama","thriller"],
    "director": "Daniel Espinosa",
    "performer": ["Jared Leto","Matt Smith","Adria Arjona","Jared Harris","Al Madrigal","Tyrese Gibson"],
    "language": "English"
}

request.description: This endpoint can be used by movie studios and independent film creators to add their movies to the database. The entries that are created will be made visible to the users to access information regarding movies they can watch. The body should contain the fields listed below and some of the parameters can be multiple values (a list) and these special (multi) parameters are genre, director, performer, and language.

request.description:
This endpoint can be used when a user wants to see the new movies that have recently come out. 

The parameter 'r_date' specifies the date that the user would like to see which new movies have come out at that point in time. 
For example, if r_date = 2020-01-01, then it will return a list of movies that have come out before that date, sorting by which movies are closest to the date.

response.name: New Movies

request.description: The Genre endpoint can be used to retrieve all movies of a certain genre currently showing in theatres. This endpoint can only be used by a Regular User and not an Admin

response.name: Genre

query.description: specifies the genre for which movies are retrieved
Name of the performer the user wishes to search

request.description:
This endpoint can be used when a user wants to retrieve all movies a movie performer performs in.

The parameter 'performer_name' takes the name of the performer the user wishes to search as a parameter.

For example if performerName is “Al Pacino” all movies showing Al Pacino are retrieved.

response.name: Search Performer

query.description: Name of the performer the user wishes to search

request.description:
This endpoint can be used when a user wants to retrieve all movies a movie performer performs in.

The parameter 'performer_name' takes the name of the performer the user wishes to search as a parameter.

For example if performerName is “Al Pacino” all movies showing Al Pacino are retrieved.

query.description: Name of the performer the user wishes to search

array

specifies desired date to search movie for

request.description: This endpoint can be used when a user wants to retrieve all movies showing on a certain date at a specific theatre. This endpoint can only be used by Regular Users and not Admins

response.name: Specif Movie Theater

query.description: specifies desired theater to search movies for
specifies desired date to search movie for

response.body:
{
    "data": [
        {
            "Movie_ID": 1,
            "Title": "The Irishman",
            "Theater_name": "abc movies",
            "Start_time": "2020-04-04T09:00:00",
            "End_time": "2020-04-04T12:00:00",
            "Description": "An aging hitman recalls his time with the mob and the intersecting events with his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.",
            "Theater_room_no": 1
        },
        {
            "Movie_ID": 2,
            "Title": "Parasite",
            "Theater_name": "abc movies",
            "Start_time": "2020-04-04T10:00:00",
            "End_time": "2020-04-04T13:00:00",
            "Description": "A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.",
            "Theater_room_no": 2
        },
        {
            "Movie_ID": 3,
            "Title": "The Favourite",
            "Theater_name": "abc movies",
            "Start_time": "2020-04-04T11:00:00",
            "End_time": "2020-04-04T14:00:00",
            "Description": "In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne and her close friend, Lady Sarah, governs the country in her stead. When a new servant, Abigail, arrives, her charm endears her to Sarah.",
            "Theater_room_no": 3
        },
        {
            "Movie_ID": 4,
            "Title": "The Farewell I",
            "Theater_name": "abc movies",
            "Start_time": "2020-04-04T12:00:00",
            "End_time": "2020-04-04T15:00:00",
            "Description": "A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.",
            "Theater_room_no": 4
        },
        {
            "Movie_ID": 5,
            "Title": "Shoplifters",
            "Theater_name": "abc movies",
            "Start_time": "2020-04-04T13:00:00",
            "End_time": "2020-04-04T16:00:00",
            "Description": "A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.",
            "Theater_room_no": 5
        }
    ]
}

query.description: movie title
desired theater name to search for movie
datetime (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) specifying the begining of the search window

request.description: The Timeslot endpoint can be used when a user wants to retrieve all movies showing within a certain time window in a specific theatre. This endpoint can only be used by Regular Users and not Admins

request.description: The Timeslot endpoint can be used when a user wants to retrieve all movies showing within a certain time window in a specific theatre. This endpoint can only be used by Regular Users and not Admins

response.name: TimeSlot

query.description: desired theater
datetime (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) specifying the begining of the search window
dateime (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss) specifying the end of the search window
